name: RYNANSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, set light to 50 percent”
”Alexa, set the light to red please”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.

Developer Terms of Use
des: RYNAN Technologies Vietnam JSC. is a unique company in Vietnam to do research, integration, production and commercialization of the cloud-connected smart devices. Software as a Services (SaaS) and Mobile Applications (Apps) for smart system sush as: smart water, energy and lighting networks to serve the residential, industrial and agricultural sectors.
